snippet.title: Splatter Blood Red Edition Release Trailer
snippet.description:
*Splatter - Blood Red Edition*
is now released on Steam! TopDown shooter with light/shadow gameplay and a gripping Film Noir-style story.
http://store.steampowered.com/app/281920
